name: Zombie A
description: Remember, if you ever find yourself in a zombie apocalypse, just head to the nearest inn, enjoy a nice cold pint, and wait for all of it to blow over.

name: Zombie B
description: See now you have the perfect excuse for that abysmal reaction time!

name: Vampire A
description: You won't burn up in direct sunlight, trust me bro.

name: Vampire B
description: Drinking blood already seems kind of like a chore, but honestly what good is eternal life if you can't eat garlic?

name: Strawberry Blonde
description: Strawberries aren't even classified as berries, honestly we're doomed as a species.

name: Pink
description: So cute.

name: Red
description: Dye your hair red, it matches nicely with the mighty fire burning your heart.

name: Orange
description: Perfect for cheering on Max!

name: Lime
description: Dye your hair a fresh lime green.

name: Teal
description: Dye your hair a tropical teal.

name: Blue
description: Bring out the anime protagonist within you.

name: Purple
description: Purple, the colour of kings and queens.

name: Yellow

name: Red
description: Enemies with red eyes are always more dangerous than those without them, maybe that'll translate to RUMBLE too?

name: Black
